A4.text: A joint bid by Milan and Cortina d'Ampezzo was awarded the 2026 Winter Olympics.

A5.text: The Games will primarily utilize existing venues across Lombardy and Northeast Italy, including those used by the 1956 Winter Olympics previously held in Cortina d'Ampezzo.
